go_data.justification: p62 is associated with the pointed end of the Arp1 filament and contains predicted cargo-binding motifs.
p62 is a component of the dynactin complex, which is associated with cytoplasmic dynein.
p62 is part of the dynactin complex, which interacts with microtubules.
p62 is part of the pointed-end complex, which assembles with other subunits to form the dynactin complex.
